name: Water Car: Beach AU Racing
description:
Get ready to fulfill the water car racing challenges. This american water car beach racer game is best than the other normal water games. Racing car jeep and making crazy stunts on impossible tracks in water will be very adventurous.

Features:
- It's Free with no internet connection required
- Futuristic Floating limo cars for real riders
- Underwater driving simulation
- Realistic beach and jet ski stunt bike animations
- Realistic and dynamic modern car physics
- Modern beach stunts and surfing racing simulation
- Racing And Time Challenge modes
